issue.title: [GLib][Parquet] Add support for getting number of rows through metadata
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14072](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14072). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Would like to be able to read in the number of rows of a Parquet file through the metadata in Apache Arrow GLib. 

 

Having to read in the entire table to get the number of rows from a Parquet file causes a big performance bottleneck.
